# Workspace Setup Progress

## Project: EcomStore - Product Dashboard

### Status: ✅ Complete

A modern Next.js 15+ ecommerce application with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

### Completed Steps:

- ✅ Next.js 15+ project scaffolded with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
- ✅ shadcn/ui installed and configured with custom indigo theme
- ✅ All required components installed (Button, Card, Input, Calendar, Popover, etc.)
- ✅ Project structure created with proper folder organization
- ✅ Theme provider implemented with light/dark mode toggle
- ✅ API utilities created for DummyJSON integration
- ✅ Date generation system implemented (reproducible dates based on product ID)
- ✅ Product listing page with pagination, search, and filters
- ✅ Date range calendar filter with hover preview cards
- ✅ Product detail page with image gallery
- ✅ Favorites functionality with localStorage persistence
- ✅ Header with favorites counter
- ✅ Responsive design for all screen sizes
- ✅ Custom indigo styling for selected states
- ✅ README documentation completed

### Technologies Used:

- Next.js 15+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v4
- shadcn/ui components
- next-themes
- date-fns
- react-day-picker
- lucide-react

### Next Steps:

1. Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
2. Visit http://localhost:3000 to view the application
3. Test all features:
   - Product browsing and pagination
   - Search functionality
   - Category filtering
   - Date range filtering with calendar
   - Favorites system
   - Theme toggle
   - Product detail pages

### Features Implemented:

✅ Product list with pagination (10 per page)
✅ Search by product name/description
✅ Category filter dropdown
✅ Interactive date range calendar with:
  - Custom indigo styling (#6366f1)
  - Hover preview cards showing formatted dates
  - Smooth animations
  - Light/dark theme support
✅ Product detail pages with image galleries
✅ Favorites management (localStorage)
✅ Theme toggle (light/dark)
✅ Fully responsive design
✅ Loading states and error handling
✅ Accessibility features
